alert.note: Alert for Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:34PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Callahan and northeastern Taylor Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 933 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dyess Afb, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Wylie, Tye, Buffalo Gap, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, View, Caps, Dyess Afb and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 275 and 281, and between Mile Markers 292 and 293. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
